title: Nimbus Datagrid
description: High-performance React datatable with sorting, filtering, grouping-aggregation pagination for any csv data file
long_description: Datagrid is a lightweight, customizable React component for rendering large datasets efficiently. Supports row selection, column resizing, virtual scrolling for 10k+ rows, and integrations like CSV/PDF export. Built with Tailwind for styling; ideal for dashboards and admin panels. Live demo showcases real-time interactions.

title: Nyaydoot
description: AI legal assistant with vernacular support, trained on 8 law textbooks and the Indian Constitution
long_description: AI legal assistant with vernacular support, trained on 8 law textbooks and the Indian Constitution

title: RecomZone
description: Content-based recommendation engine for movies & music using TF-IDF + cosine similarity.
long_description: RecomZone demonstrates personalized recommendations without collaborative data. Built with Pandas for data wrangling, Scikit-learn for vectorization & similarity, and a MERN stack UI to browse suggestions. Datasets: MovieLens 1M & Million Song Dataset subset.

title: Swift Reader
description: Summarizes news articles into bite-sized content (60-100 words) with fast processing.
long_description: Swift Reader fetches trending news via Bing News API, extracts clean text with BeautifulSoup, and generates ultra-fast summaries with the DistilBART model. MERN stack serves a responsive dashboard with one-click summarization.

title: DevStar Toolkit
description: Free online developer toolkit for maximizing efficiency and productivity.
long_description: Free online developer toolkit for maximizing efficiency and productivity.

title: Airbnb Clone
description: Full-stack Airbnb clone with real-time booking and user authentication.
long_description: Full-stack Airbnb clone with real-time booking and user authentication.

title: Major Project
description: Academic project exploring advanced computing concepts in Python.
long_description: Academic project exploring advanced computing concepts in Python.

title: JSON parser
description: Hand-written recursive descent JSON parser in C++
long_description: A teaching-oriented JSON parser that tokenizes and parses JSON strings following the official spec. Includes error handling, pretty-printing, and a tiny CLI. Great for understanding parser combinator patterns.

title: Web Server
description: High-performance HTTP/1.1 web server in C++ using threading and custom routing.
long_description: Academic multithreaded web server supporting GET, static file serving. Handles concurrent connections efficiently.
